name: CityTemperatureInfo
0:
”Alexa open city temperature info”
”tell me today's temperature”
”my city is Delhi”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: city temperature info
des:
Provides the temperature Information by calling specific APIs related to get temperature information.
Need to provide a city name .
After enabling the skill say things like "Alexa open city temperature info",
the users will get temperature information of the provided city. Currently the skill is in beta version and some more enhancement will be there in future.
